TopicTitle: Linux Where are the crash logs?

Articles.Content:
Simple question. I can't figure out where the crash logs are for linux. I know where the player.log is but not the other two logs usually used in diagnosis? Also wasn't sure if to ask here or in the support forum.

Is it just player.log and KSP.log? I was assuming there was another two log files somewhere.

Edited May 13, 2016 by Arugela
According to the stickied bug reporting guide in the support sub-forum, it's just those two.
